titles.title: The Greatest Thing in all my life

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
The Greatest thing in all my life
Is knowing You
The Greatest thing in all my life
Is knowing You

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
I want to know you Lord
I want to know you more
The greatest thing in all my life
Is knowing You

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
The Greatest thing in all my life
Is serving You
The Greatest thing in all my life
Is serving You

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
I want to know you Lord
I want to know you more
The greatest thing in all my life
Is serving You

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
The Greatest thing in all my life
Is loving You
The Greatest thing in all my life
Is loving You

verse.name: v6
verse.lines:
I want to know you Lord
I want to know you more
The greatest thing in all my life
Is loving You
